responses.text: That's not even a question!
Ask me a QUESTION, genius!
Do you see a question mark? Neither do I.
I answer questions, not statements.
Try putting a question mark at the end?
This is a Q&A, not a statement board.
Come back when you have an actual question.
I'm not sure what you want from me here...
That's a statement, not a question!
Did you forget the question mark?
I need a question to work with here.
What am I supposed to do with that?
Questions usually end with '?'
I can't read your mind. Ask a question!
That's nice. Now ask me something.
Cool story. Got a question?
I'm here to answer questions, not statements.
Did you mean to ask something?
Rephrase that as a question, please.
I'm confused. Where's the question?
Uh... was that supposed to be a question?
I only respond to questions!
Nice chat, but I need questions.
That doesn't look like a question to me.
I'm not a therapist, ask a question!
Are you asking or telling? I can't tell.
You forgot to ask something.
I need an actual question here, buddy.
What do you want me to do with that?
That's not how this works...
Try again, this time with a question.
I'm a Q&A bot, emphasis on the Q!
You're supposed to ask questions!
That's a statement. I need a question.
Did someone skip grammar class?
Questions. I answer questions.
No question, no answer. Simple.
I literally can't answer that. It's not a question.
You know what a question is, right?
That's fascinating. Now ask me something.
I'm going to need you to ask a question.
Statements go in a diary. Questions come here.
Ever heard of a question mark?
I was expecting a question...
That's not a question, that's a declaration!
Ask me something I can actually answer!
You do know I answer questions, right?
Not a question. Try again.
I'm sensing a lack of question marks here.
That's great and all, but where's the question?
